info.title: ApiManagementClient
info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on Global Policies in Azure API Management deployment.

get.description: Lists all the Global Policy definitions of the Api Management service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Returns an array of Policy Contracts.

schema.description: The response of the list policy operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the Global policy definition of the Api Management service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Policy.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Policy Export Format.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

put.description: Creates or updates the global policy configuration of the Api Management service.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Policy.

parameters.description: ETag of the Entity. Not required when creating an entity, but required when updating an entity.

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

value.description: Contents of the Policy as defined by the format.

type.description: Resource type for API Management resource.

200.description: Global policy configuration of the Api Management service was successfully updated.

201.description: Global policy configuration was successfully created.
